text: Maria Teresa Herreras Lopez (born March 16, 1962 in Valladolid) is a swimmer from Spain. She has a disability and is an S3 type swimmer. She raced at the 1976 Summer Paralympics. She came in second in two different swimming races and third in two swimming races. == References == Category:Spanish swimmers Category:Living people Category:1962 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:People from Valladolid Category:1976 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type S3
title: María Teresa Herreras López
